Control Name: 2.1 Always change vendor-supplied defaults and remove or disable unnecessary default accounts before installing a system on the network.
Control Family: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems

control_attributes.Goals: Build and Maintain a Secure Network and Systems
control_attributes.Control: 2.1 Always change vendor-supplied defaults and remove or disable unnecessary default accounts before installing a system on the network.
control_attributes.Requirement: 2. Do not use vendor-supplied defaults for system passwords and other security parameters
